HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Doručení na adresu vybraným dopravcem (vyberte si v košíku) od 90 Kč

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Doručení na adresu vybraným dopravcem před první uzamykatelné dveře od 200 Kč

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Balíkovna od 49 Kč, GLS Parcel Shop od 56 Kč, PPL výdejní místo od 65 Kč, Zásilkovna od 65 Kč, One Point od 69 Kč, DPD pickup od 76 Kč

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: GLS od 56 Kč, PPL od 65 Kč, Zásilkovna od 65 Kč, One od 69 Kč, DPD od 76 Kč

SUMMARY: Penta.cz offers several delivery methods in the Czech Republic. Home delivery starts from 90 Kč, and bulky item delivery from 200 Kč. A wide range of pickup options is available, including personal pickup at their Katovice branch (free), and various parcel shops/lockers (Balíkovna, GLS, PPL, Zásilkovna, One Point, DPD) with prices starting from 49 Kč. The final shipping cost and choice of carrier are determined in the shopping cart. NOTABLE FEATURES: Free in-store pickup at the Katovice location. Delivery of bulky items includes options for carrying items upstairs and removal of old appliances with some carriers. Cash on delivery is available, but the surcharge is not specified. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information page is clear and well-structured, providing starting prices for different delivery types. However, it lacks specific details such as delivery timeframes, a full list of home delivery providers, express/weekend delivery options, and the exact cost of the COD surcharge. The final details are only available in the shopping cart, which makes a full comparison difficult without starting a purchase.
